content:
IUnvalidatedValueProviderSource Interface

Definition

Defines the methods that are required for a value provider that supports skipping request validation.

In this Article

public interface IUnvalidatedValueProviderSource : System.Web.ModelBinding.IValueProviderSource

Properties

ValidateInput

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the provider validates input.

public bool ValidateInput { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the provider validates input; otherwise, false.
